Literature.Title: Genomics-Driven Discovery of Chlorinated Cyclic Hexapeptides Ulleungmycins A and B from a Streptomyces Species.
Literature.Author: Son S, Hong YS, Jang M, Heo KT, Lee B, Jang JP, Kim JW, Ryoo IJ, Kim WG, Ko SK, Kim BY, Jang JH, Ahn JS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3167(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3505(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MIC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae KCTC 5412(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis KCTC 5191(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli CCARM 1356(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MIC=128µg/ml)
